definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
see 字紙簍|字纸篓[zi4 zhi3 lou3]

sentences.english: Everybody screws up, but i'm the screw-up.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都捅了篓子，但我是罪魁祸首。

sentences.english: It was soon replaced with an empty one.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿就给换了一个空篓子。

sentences.english: Three other boys help her carry the banana baskets.
sentences.chinese: 另外三位男孩帮她搬香蕉篓子。

sentences.english: Please put your waste in the basket.
The fish are then taken and thrown into a big basket by Damin.
sentences.chinese: 然和大民取下鱼，并把它们扔进一个大篓子里。

definition: to stab/to poke/to prod/to nudge/to disclose
social gaffe or blunder/faux pas/see 出洋相[chu1 yang2 xiang4]
to make a mess of sth
to put on airs/self-important/high and mighty
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
